meta.description: Structured personal context for Rashid McMoodoo. Use for LLM prompt injection. Update this file when bio, experience, or skills change.

identity.title: Dev | DevRel | Tech Writer
identity.tagline: Dev | Tech Writer | DevRel in DeFi
identity.shortBio: Web3/DeFi Dev & DevRel. Former Technical Writer in cybersecurity. Polyglot Software Engineer and Technical Writer across cybersecurity (Palo Alto Networks), industrial IoT (Baker Hughes/GE), logistics, and Web3. Building in DeFi & Web3; open to collaborations and speaking.

experience.title: Web3 & DeFi Hackathoner
experience.description: Actively participated in Web3 hackathons, building DeFi primitives with Uniswap v4, 1inch Aqua, Chainlink CCIP, and more. Multiple prize winner at EthGlobal events.

experience.title: Hybrid Senior Technical Writer / Engineer
experience.description: Led docs-as-code transition and single-handedly migrated legacy API docs to a new domain. Improved accuracy and DX through CI/CD engineering in 30+ codebases. Collaborated with engineering teams to clearly expose backend systems via APIs. Wrote SDK code snippets in Go, Python, Java, and Node. Owned and maintained API reference docs (pan.dev).

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of Scout portable devices for machine condition monitoring using C++, HTML5, Angular, and CSS. Also built a comprehensive testing framework in C# to validate system performance and reliability.

experience.title: Senior Solutions Architect
experience.description: Provisioned and managed AWS cloud infrastructure; rebuilt a legacy web app using Angular, Node, and MongoDB; created technical documentation and user manuals; mentored junior software engineers.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Led development of a marketing automation platform and end-to-end lead generation and conversion optimization suite using Angular, PHP7, and Zend Framework.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Enhanced an existing web app with new features, worked with product owners to prioritize the backlog, wrote Bash and Python automation scripts.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Launched a new ASP.NET responsive web app for mobile and desktop use (Kenworth plant mainline dashboard). Independently developed and released a dashboard application that aggregated data from multiple systems.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Iteratively optimized and enhanced a Windows application, built integrations with other apps via APIs.

experience.title: Software Developer / Research Assistant
experience.location: University of Nevada, Reno – Brain Computation Lab
experience.description: Assisted in deploying deep neural network models, performed Linux system administration, provided programming support for researchers by modifying Perl, Python, and Bash scripts.

skills.details: Solidity on Ethereum, Base, Arbitrum; Cairo on Starknet; Rust on Arbitrum Stylus
Backend: Rust, C++, Python, C#; Frontend: React; Scripting: Bash, Python, jq

hackathons.description: Privacy-preserving DeFi system using 1inch Aqua shared-liquidity protocol.
Solo win implementing a custom pool for rebasing tokens using Uniswap v4 hooks.
Team project integrating CoWSwap, Euler Finance, Pyth Network, and Brevis ZK.
Solo project minting NFTs on Base using Arbitrum liquidity via Chainlink CCIP.
Autonomous AI agent with its own wallet powering DeFi actions. Team project.

writing.technicalWriting: Owned pan.dev API reference at Palo Alto Networks; gathered specs from engineering teams into one cohesive site; contributed to repos and advocated for users. Ghostwrote technical content for XLAB Steampunk (Ansible/Red Hat).
